name: presets_allways_enabled
label: Allways enable presets
tooltip: This option enables presets on all maps. Will not allways work when the extension is to slow to load.

name: total_progress_bar_legacy_mode
label: Legacy total progress bar
tooltip: This option sets the total progress bar back to legacy mode so all categories are counted.

name: custom_search_bar
label: Custom Searchbar
tooltip: This option replaces the default list search bar with a slightly larger one and uses a fuzzy search algorithm to find matches.
